interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: A Walk In The Woods
Review Date: 2021/05/27
Categories: Comedy, Drama, Beautiful, Sentimental
Product Description: ['After spending two decades in England, Bill Bryson (Robert Redford) returns to the U.S., where he decides the best way to connect with his homeland is to hike the Appalachian Trail with one of his oldest friends, Stephen Katz (Nick Nolte).']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ken Kwapis'], 'Producers': ['Robert Redford', 'Bill Holderman', 'Chip Diggins', 'Jeremiah Samuels', 'Jake Eberts'], 'Starring': ['Robert Redford', 'Nick Nolte', 'Emma Thompson']}
Review Text: great movie night. read book and thoroughly loved the movie. funny and touching
Review Title: love love love this movie
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

description: After spending two decades in England, Bill Bryson (Robert Redford) returns to the U.S., where he decides the best way to connect with his homeland is to hike the Appalachian Trail with one of his oldest friends, Stephen Katz (Nick Nolte).
